MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Weston Rhyn, affecting properties in Quinta Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.25AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead cable caused by a fallen tree and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.25AM on 11th March 2021.
